item.title: CVE-2022-20039|2024-08-03T01:55:46.191Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6833%2C%20mt6853%2C%20mt6873%2C%20mt6877%2C%20mt6883%2C%20mt6893%2C%20mt8791%2C%20mt8797
item.description: In ccu driver, there is a possible memory corruption due to an integer overflow. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS06183345; Issue ID: ALPS06183345.
